What is the easiest way to place an order at Tanya’s Baking? You can place an order by calling or WhatsApping +91-9677276248 during business hours.
What are the services offered by Tanya’s Baking? They offer home delivery, take-away and customised cakes as per your requirement.
Does Tanya’s Baking offer cake customisation? Yes — customers can customise theme cakes and colours by specifying their requirements.
What are the working hours of Tanya’s Baking? Business hours are approximately 9:30 AM to 9:30 PM daily in the Puthur, Chennai location.
Does Tanya’s Baking offer gluten-free or special diet options? You should contact the bakery directly to check as dietary options are handled case by case.

Brownies Celebrate love with our exquisite 1 Tiered theme cake, beautifully decorated and perfect for your special moments!

Cup Cakes Indulge in our rich chocolate cupcake, topped with velvety frosting for an irresistible sweet treat!
